doc.title: 4b
doc.plot: 4B explores the tribulations faced by artistic inspiration and creation. An artist at work is a fascinating state of mind. 4B explores this abstract entity and how it is affected by real, material obstacles. It's also an experiment in a formally economical environment, making use of basic technical resources.
